sourcesContent:
// * import assets / product picture
import product1 from "./../Assets/img/product-1.png";
import product2 from "./../Assets/img/product-2.png";
import product3 from "./../Assets/img/product-3.png";
import product4 from "./../Assets/img/product-4.png";
import product5 from "./../Assets/img/product-5.png";
import product6 from "./../Assets/img/product-6.png";



export const storeProducts = [
  {
    id: 1,
    productName: "Phoenix Feather Core.",
    productImage: product1,
    price: 70,
    owner: "Harry Potter",
    info: "11 inch long, made of holly, and possessed a phoenix feather core.This was described by Garrick Ollivander to be an unusual combination of wand core and wood.The feather was donated by Fawkes, Albus Dumbledore's phoenix.",
    inCart: false,
    count: 0,
    total: 0,
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    productName: "Dragon Heartstring",
    productImage: product2,
    price: 55,
    owner: "Hermion Granger",
    info:
      "10¾ inch long, made of vine wood,and possessed a dragon heartstring core. The wand was manufactured by Garrick Ollivander",
    inCart: false,
    count: 0,
    total: 0,
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    productName: "Unicorn Hair",
    productImage: product3,
    price: 50,
    owner: "Ronald Weasley",
    info:
      "14 inch long, made of willow and had a core of unicorn hair. The wand was manufactured by Garrick Ollivander. This wand seemed to suit Ron better than his first wand, which he had inherited from his older brother Charlie.",
    inCart: false,
    count: 0,
    total: 0,
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    productName: "Unicorn Hair",
    productImage: product4,
    price: 40,
    owner: "Draco Malfoy",
    info: "10 inch long, made of hawthorn wood, and had a unicorn hair core. The wand was manufactured by Garrick Ollivander and was described by him as being reasonably springy",
    inCart: false,
    count: 0,
    total: 0,
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    productName: "Half Blood",
    productImage: product5,
    price: 24,
    owner: "Severus Snape",
    info: "",
    inCart: false,
    count: 0,
    total: 0,
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    productName: "Dragon Fire",
    productImage: product6,
    price: 24,
    owner: "Sirius Black",
    info: "",
    inCart: false,
    count: 0,
    total: 0,
},
];

export const detailProduct = {
  id: 1,
  productName: "Google Pixel - Black",
  productImage: product1,
  price: 10,
  owner: "google",
  info:
    "Lorem ipsum dolor amet offal butcher quinoa sustainable gastropub, echo park actually green juice sriracha paleo. Brooklyn sriracha semiotics, DIY coloring book mixtape craft beer sartorial hella blue bottle. Tote bag wolf authentic try-hard put a bird on it mumblecore. Unicorn lumbersexual master cleanse blog hella VHS, vaporware sartorial church-key cardigan single-origin coffee lo-fi organic asymmetrical. Taxidermy semiotics celiac stumptown scenester normcore, ethical helvetica photo booth gentrify.",
  inCart: false,
  count: 0,
  total: 0,
};
